title: Courgette bhajis
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon salt', '250g courgettes, grated', '100g gram flour', '1/2 teaspoon ginger paste', '1/2 teaspoon garlic paste', '1/4 teaspoon crushed red chillies', '1/4 teaspoon parpika', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '250ml vegetable oil']
